## Studies {.unnumbered}

Some useful geospatial, spatial-temporal and geostatistics studies in this area that can be applied to the Rwandan context include:

1.  Prevalence of stunting in Rwanda at sector-level and possible multi-sectoral interventions linking the Ministry of Health and the Ministry of Agriculture. Comparisons with crop yield, cost of living etc. Refer to this documentation: <https://www.paulamoraga.com/book-geospatial/>
2.  Precision agriculture and geospatial techniques for sustainable disease control [@roberts2021].
3.  Applications of Geographic Information Systems and Geostatistics in Plant Disease Epidemiology and Management [@nelson1999].
4.  Geospatial analysis and modelling in the prevention and control of animal diseases. USA case study can be found here: <https://www.izs.it/vet_italiana/2007/43_3/549_557.pdf>
